body:
Comment 4: 
Sorry, not interested.
We get a lot of mileage out of having everything in one directory tree.
I think the FHS is misguided.  It makes it harder to copy, install, and
remove software.  If you need to comply with it, make $GOROOT /usr/lib/go
and $GOBIN /usr/bin.
_Merged into issue #1239._
